verses.kjv: This know also, that in the last days perilous times shall come.
verses.ct: Understand this: dangerous times will come in the last days.

verses.kjv: For men shall be lovers of their own selves, covetous, boasters, proud, blasphemers, disobedient to parents, unthankful, unholy,
verses.ct: People will be self-absorbed, greedy, arrogant, full of pride, abusive in their speech, rebellious toward their parents, ungrateful, and without reverence for what is sacred.

verses.kjv: Without natural affection, trucebreakers, false accusers, incontinent, fierce, despisers of those that are good,
verses.ct: They will be without love for their own families, unwilling to make peace, slanderous, lacking self-control, brutal, and hostile toward anything good.

verses.kjv: Traitors, heady, highminded, lovers of pleasures more than lovers of God;
verses.ct: They will be betrayers, reckless, conceited, and devoted to pleasure rather than devoted to God.

verses.kjv: Having a form of godliness, but denying the power thereof: from such turn away.
verses.ct: They will maintain an outward appearance of godliness while rejecting its real power. Stay away from people like that.

verses.kjv: For of this sort are they which creep into houses, and lead captive silly women laden with sins, led away with divers lusts,
verses.ct: These are the kind who worm their way into homes and manipulate vulnerable women who are weighed down by sins and driven by all sorts of desires.

verses.kjv: Ever learning, and never able to come to the knowledge of the truth.
verses.ct: Such women are always studying but never arriving at a genuine understanding of the truth.

verses.kjv: Now as Jannes and Jambres withstood Moses, so do these also resist the truth: men of corrupt minds, reprobate concerning the faith.
verses.ct: Just as Jannes and Jambres opposed Moses, these people also fight against the truth. Their minds are corrupted, and they have failed the test when it comes to faith.

verses.kjv: But they shall proceed no further: for their folly shall be manifest unto all men, as theirs also was.
verses.ct: But they won't get very far, because their foolishness will become obvious to everyone — just as it did with those 2 men.

verses.kjv: But thou hast fully known my doctrine, manner of life, purpose, faith, longsuffering, charity, patience,
verses.ct: You, however, have closely followed my teaching, my way of life, my purpose, my faith, my patience, my love, and my endurance.

verses.kjv: Persecutions, afflictions, which came unto me at Antioch, at Iconium, at Lystra; what persecutions I endured: but out of them all the Lord delivered me.
verses.ct: You know about the persecutions and sufferings that happened to me in Antioch, Iconium, and Lystra — the kind of persecution I went through. Yet the Lord rescued me from all of it.

verses.kjv: Yea, and all that will live godly in Christ Jesus shall suffer persecution.
verses.ct: The reality is that everyone who wants to live a godly life in Christ Jesus will face persecution.

verses.kjv: But evil men and seducers shall wax worse and worse, deceiving, and being deceived.
verses.ct: Meanwhile, wicked people and con artists will go from bad to worse, deceiving others and being deceived themselves.

verses.kjv: But continue thou in the things which thou hast learned and hast been assured of, knowing of whom thou hast learned them;
verses.ct: But you must hold firmly to what you have learned and become convinced of, since you know who taught these things to you.

verses.kjv: And that from a child thou hast known the holy scriptures, which are able to make thee wise unto salvation through faith which is in Christ Jesus.
verses.ct: Remember that from childhood you have known the holy scriptures, which have the power to give you the wisdom that leads to salvation through faith in Christ Jesus.

verses.kjv: All scripture is given by inspiration of God, and is profitable for doctrine, for reproof, for correction, for instruction in righteousness:
verses.ct: Every scripture is inspired by God and is useful for teaching, for exposing error, for correcting behavior, and for training in righteousness.

verses.kjv: That the man of God may be perfect, throughly furnished unto all good works.
verses.ct: Through scripture, the person who belongs to God becomes fully capable and completely equipped for every good work.
